Good video by @MervinPraison


Mervin Praison:‚ÄÇOpenGPTs: the open-source alternative to OpenAI's GPTs.

Subscribe to YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@MervinPraison

Choose from 60+ LLMs, 100+ tools, and control your app's cognitive architecture with Free Assistant, RAG, Chatbot.

#opengpts #gptstore @LangChainAI @tavilyai @RobocorpInc‚Ä¶
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Wayde Gilliam: This is a really good series folks‚Ä¶
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇWayde Gilliam
This is a really good series folks‚Ä¶


LangChain:‚ÄÇüè¨LangGraph: Persistence

LangGraph comes with built in persistence. This means you can easily add "memory" to any LangGraph agents

This is done by passing in a checkpointer to a LangGraph object. Then, the state of all runs are saved via that checkpointer

We added an example‚Ä¶
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: ü§Ø I was astonished that you could run @nomic_ai's new OSS embeddings *in your browser* with @xenovacom's Transformers.js! If you want...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
ü§Ø I was astonished that you could run @nomic_ai's new OSS embeddings *in your browser* with @xenovacom's Transformers.js!

If you want to play with them, I updated my @ollama + @LangChainAI + @dawchihliou Voy fully-local chat with PDF app to use it:

https://github.com/jacoblee93/fully-local-pdf-chatbot


Xenova:‚ÄÇNomic Embed is out: a new 8K text embedding model by @nomic_ai! üöÄ

It's also compatible with ü§ó Transformers.js, meaning you can generate embeddings directly in your browser (no server required)!

item.title: üìà Looking to upgrade from LangChain 0.0.x to 0.1.x? Our friends @neo4j just did while updating their Python Graphacademy + LLMs course. The changes...
item.description:
üìà Looking to upgrade from LangChain 0.0.x to 0.1.x?

Our friends @neo4j just did while updating their Python Graphacademy + LLMs course.

The changes are backwards compatible, but there are a few new recommended patterns Martin goes over - worth a read!

https://medium.com/neo4j/langchain-v0-1-updating-graphacademy-neo4j-llm-courses-689e7c4eff3e

item.description:
üöÄBuild a Chat PDF app in Python with LangChain, OpenAI, and Streamlit

In this tutorial, you'll learn how to build a project by using Langchain and Streamlit to develop GUI-based ChatGPT for your PDF documents.

Code: https://github.com/strongSoda/chat-with-pdf-tutorial

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: ü¶úüï∏Ô∏è LangGraph.js Tracing ü¶úüï∏Ô∏è LangGraph allows you to construct long-running, agentic @LangChainAI workflows to solve a wid...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
ü¶úüï∏Ô∏è LangGraph.js Tracing ü¶úüï∏Ô∏è

LangGraph allows you to construct long-running, agentic @LangChainAI workflows to solve a wide range of tasks.

This means tracing and debugging via LangSmith is more important than ever. LangGraph.js 0.0.3 includes better support for tracking‚Ä¶

item.title: ü§î"Is my LLM application getting better or worse over time?" This is one of the biggest questions that AI engineers struggle with. Evaluation of LLM...
item.description:
ü§î"Is my LLM application getting better or worse over time?"

This is one of the biggest questions that AI engineers struggle with. Evaluation of LLM application is still quite difficult.

We've recently released two features in LangSmith to make this easier

üìàFirst, to help‚Ä¶

item.title: RT Andrew Nguonly: I feel like there are more use cases for online, in-memory RAG implementations that aren't being highlighted enough. @LangChainAI M...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇAndrew Nguonly
I feel like there are more use cases for online, in-memory RAG implementations that aren't being highlighted enough.

@LangChainAI MemoryVectorStore is trivial to implement with @ollama for completely client-side RAG. No database operations!

Example: https://medium.com/@andrewnguonly/lets-normalize-online-in-memory-rag-88e8169e9806
item.author: LangChain
